attributes.action: OPEN AND SAVE TOLLCROSS WINTER GARDENS(VICTORIAN GREENHOUSE) GLASGOW
attributes.additional_details: FEARS THE WINTER GARDENS WILL NEVER REOPEN AGAIN, WE CANT LOOSE YET ANOTHER HERITAGE SITE IN GLASGOW, GLASGOW CITY COUNCIL'S LAND AND ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES, STATES THE DEPARTMENT, "DOES NOT HAVE ANY PLANS TO RE-OPEN THE WINTER GARDENS" PLEASE SING AND SAVE THIS SITE.

rejection.details: One for the Local Authority, not the Government.  Perhaps try and petition the Scottish Parliament, MSPs etc?
